name: Lost Soldiers
description:
Players left hand should be on WASD to move and use abilities and right on the mouse to rotate the camera with left click.

WASD to move.

Right click to rotate the camera.

Special ability are 1-4

E is attack when close.

Interface is F

F1 to access the main menu.

Explore the Empire of Taral, a once highly militarized society led by their warrior ruling class the Taran, whom conquered their known world millennials ago.  With no more world left to conquer the Taran numbers eventually dwindle giving way to a feudal system of governance. Now Taral, a shadow of its former self in term of military capabilities, formally led by the Taran Emperor but it is the individual lords that hold the power, is under attack.  The attack is orchestrated by the Xingdari a mysterious race of magical beings that descended from the mountains that was once thought to be unhabitable by Taral. Play as the Prisoner, one of the last Taran, as they make their way out of the Taran heartland and restore the Taran to their former glory.

Features:

Two Faction: Perhaps Taral times its up, the empire is old and dying, maybe the Xingdari are a better bet to win this war. Pledge your allegiance to Taral or Xingdari and topple the other opposing empire.

Empire Building and Diplomacy: As a Taran lord you can build up your provinces and land however you want, acquire new land, build and upgrades building in those lands then witness your personal fiefdom prosper before your very eyes.  A Taran greatest weapon might be their tongue, engage in diplomacy with other lords to gain powerful allies or loyal vassal, be wary thought not all lords like each other and befriending one over another can have grave consequences.

Headquarter: Invite other lords to your humble one story home or your gigantic villas to increase your relationship with them.

Three Classes: Play as the brutish warrior, versatile mage or crafty rogue. Each with their own abilities, bonuses and traits that effect how they interact with other characters. Each classes also come with 5 tiers of pickable talents to further distinguish your play style that can be gain through unique quests.
